class Players[source]

Players(**kwargs) :: Base_Handler

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
player = Player(name='Darius Leonard',college='South Carolina State', height=1.88, weight=104)
player._name_id
player.get_properties()

{'name': 'Darius Leonard',
 'object_id': '1e3a88e6-a245-3967-b54a-3f146a181789',
 'age': None,
 'position': None,
 'height': 1.88,
 'weight': 104.0,
 'college': 'South Carolina State',
 'team_id': None}

class Teams[source]

Teams(**kwargs) :: Base_Handler

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
colts = Team(name='Colts', division='AFC South')
teams = Teams(obj_list=[colts])
teams.dataframe
name object_id division seed
0 Colts 48add1b8-ba9b-3532-ad8f-39fa70a3a0f0 AFC South None
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Games[source]

Games(**kwargs) :: Base_Handler

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
texans = Team(name='Texans', division='AFC South')

rivalry = Game(t1_id=colts.object_id, t2_id=texans.object_id)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
games = Games(obj_list=[rivalry])
games.dataframe
object_id t1_id t2_id t1_score t2_score day year location
0 5c45c322-373a-497a-a929-9668dae6870c 48add1b8-ba9b-3532-ad8f-39fa70a3a0f0 fc517510-8517-36d8-b900-6402cccc5506 None None None None None
{% endraw %}
